name: Gaia Viva #09
description: GAIA - Personification of EARTH in Greek mythology. VIVA - Alive in Portuguese with a feminine pronoun. IS EARTH ALIVE? I like to think it is. In this series, I celebrate the life power of nature and its core elements and invite you to feel your connection to it. The photo base was taken at Rio Negro (Black River), Manaus, the largest blackwater river in the world, and one of the world's ten largest rivers by average discharge. Donating 22% of the sales of the Gaia Viva Series to environment protection organizations.
